= Details =
 
keyboard movement: wasd

|| *action*          ||*Keyboard*||*Gamepad*||
|| spell A           ||     1    ||    A    ||
|| Spell B           ||     2    ||    B    ||
|| change Spell A    ||   NUM 4  ||    A    ||
|| change Spell B    ||   NUM 5  ||    B    ||
|| jump              ||     up   ||   X    ||

  * Fullscreen -> F11
